issue.title: [Java] ComplexCopier does incorrect copy in some cases
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7447](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7447). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For list union vectors complex copier doesn't do correct copy.

comments.body:
